Html:
on the spell stats it says i have Spell Crit Rate: 21,48% for all spells, the problem is that i am fire mage i have 30% Crit Rate on fire.
if rawr calculates that i have 21,48% on the item comparisons list is wrong for trinkets that have "Chance on spell critical hit" like Ashtongue Talisman of Insight. shud it not calculate on 30%?

i hope that you get my point hear.
AtoI proc will be calculated depending on which spell you cast. Hover your mouse over the individual spells in the stats page to see the crit values it uses for Fireball, Scorch, Blastwave, etc.

hmm then why does it get so low score 5,83 it cant be that bad?
if i chages spec to frost 11/0/51 it gets 16.93

jondala wrote:
how come? hidden CD ?



No hidden cooldown, just result of Frostbolt having a shorter cast time.
No, really. The Ashtongue Talisman of Insight is just that bad!
